Charli says her guys say now that this new easy method is available, the E=
Ts will start to interact more.
 
 See coffeepotghost.com
 
 This is the wh=
ole point I was trying to make, all you need is something for them to form =
a voice with, and there wil be no shortage of entites that want to talk. 
 =

 I had bit of temper yesteraday, as a long time researcher accused all of =
us of getting "false communication". Maybe I'm in bitch mode, but that crap=
 really pisses me off. Who the hell is this one guy to assume everything he=
 gets is gospel truth(that no one else can hear), while we get nothing. Sti=
ll trying to calm myself so as not to upset the "harmony". 
 
 Well done ev=
eryone!!
 
 Frank-S
 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: orbhunterx@yahoo.c=
omDate: Tue, 27 Nov 2007 19:37:45 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: RCA 12-470 RA=
DIO SHACK HACK FILES




Hi,Would you please explain what you mean by "choo=
se the location carefully"? Thank You,LanceDAPS--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om, "psi_research" <vilhellm@...> wrote:>> Bruce I tend to agree with on ev=
erything you just stated. I cherish my> FB and even though I must choose th=
e location carefully with it it's> the messages that come through that make=
 it profound. But the Shack> Hack is an important development, the timing o=
f it is ironic> considering other recent Box developments. > > --- In EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333"> <paranormalinvestigating@> wrote:> >> > HEY=
 GUY'S > > > > OF COURSE I HAVE MY RS HACK AND GETTING RESULTS THE FIRST DA=
Y.> > MY INITIAL OPINION OF THE PERFORMANCE OF THIS LITTLE GEM IS FROM TWO =
> > EXPERIMENTAL SESSIONS ONE PERFORMED BY STEVE HULTAY AND MYSELF AND > > =
THE OTHER BY MYSELF ALONE. THE FILES I HAVE POSTED ARE GLEENED FROM > > ONL=
Y THE FIRST MINUTE OR SO OF A TEN MINUTE RECORDING.PLEASE TAKE A > > MINUTE=
 TO LISTEN AND POST YOUR FEEDBACK.> > > > THE FILES ARE POSTED IN THE FILE =
SECTION UNDER: > > > > 11-26-07_radio shack hack files_Bruce > > > > AFTER =
DOING ONLY ONE RECORDED SESSION AND TWO SESSIONS TOTAL. I AS A > > SERIOUS =
BOX RESEARCHER WITH EVRYDAY EXPERIMENTING ON FRANK'S,JOE'S > > AND NOW THE =
RADIO SHACK HACK BOX CAN PREMATURELY SAY THAT THIS RADIO > > MAY BE SMALL I=
N SIZE BUT IT PACKS A BIG PUNCH ! AND IT WAS UNDER OUR > > VERY NOSES ALL T=
HE TIME. THANKS TO SUM DUC FOR HIS INSIGHT IN > > DISCOVERING IT.> > > > AT=
 THE RISK OF SOUNDING REDUNDENT I MUST REITERATE THIS RS BOX WILL > > HOLD =
IT'S OWN WITH THE BIG BOYS. THE RESULTS AND LEVEL OF > > COMMUNICATION BOTH=
 IN REAL TIME DURING A SESSION AND WHAT IS MISSED > > BY OUR RUDIMENTARY HU=
MAN HEARING AND CAUGHT ON A RECORDING RIVALS OR > > MAY EVEN GIVEN ENOUGH T=
IME FOR FREQUENCY IMPRINTING BY OUR SPIRIT > > FRIENDS AND PROPER RESEARCH =
METHODS WILL SURPASS JOE'S BOX AND PULL A > > CLOSE SECOND TO FRANK'S BOX. =
> > > > AS A MATTER OF FACT MY FIRST IMPRESSION OF THE RS BOX WAS REMINICEN=
T > > OF THE AM LINEAR MODE OF MY FRANKS BOX #12. LET'S FACE IT A FRANKS > =
> BOX IS A FRANKS BOX IN AS NO TWO ARE EXACTLY THE SAME THAT IS WHAT > > MA=
KES THEM SO UNIQUE AND ALSO THE FACT THAT I BELIEVE A SMALL PART OF > > FRA=
NK HIMSELF TRANSFERS INTO EVERY BOX HE MAKES AND HE IS VERY WELL > > RESPEC=
TED ON THE OTHER SIDE FROM WHAT MY GUIDES AND TECHS TELL ME.> > > > I HAVE =
NOT HAD THE OPPORTUNITY TO USE RON RICKETS MINI BOX YET BUT I > > AM HEARIN=
G VERY GOOD THINGS ABOUT IT'S PERFORMANCE ALSO AND CAN NOT > > WAIT TO EXPE=
RIMENT WITH IT.> > > > I THINK OUR FRIENDS ON THE OTHER SIDE ARE FINALY DEC=
IDING TO PUSH > > FORWARD WITH THE COMMUNICATION PROCESS AND ALLOW IT TO BE=
COME > > ACCESABLE TO MANY MORE PEOPLE. WHAT THEY HAVE CONVEYED TO ME OVER =
> > NUMEROUS SESSIONS IS THE DESPERATE AND INTRIGAL NEED FOR COMBINED > > H=
ARMONY AMONG RESEARCHERS AND COMMUNICATORS. THE MORE MINDS THAT ARE > > THI=
NKING AND MOVING TOGETHER FOR THIS COMMON GOAL THE STRONGER THE > > SPIRITS=
 ABILITY TO COMMUNICATE AND THEY WILL HELP WITH DEVELOPE MENT > > OF THE TE=
CHNOLOGY SO THINGS ARE LOOKING UP AND HEADING TO THE FUTURE. > > > > WHAT I=
 HAVE GATHERED OVER MANY SESSIONS IS THEY DEFINATELY WANT THE > > WORD AND =
THE TECHNOLOGY SPREAD TO AS MANY AS ARE WILLING TO ACCEPT IT > > WITH AN OP=
EN MIND. I AM RATTLING ON AND HAVE DRIFTED FROM MY ORIGINAL > > POINT WHICH=
 WAS, THIS RADIO SHACK BOX IS AND WILL BE A VERY IMPORTANT > > AND USEFULL =
TOOL IN FURTHERING OUR COMMUNICATION PROCESS.> > > > THANKS FOR LISTENING.>=
 > > > BRUCE> >>
